alert.note: Alert for Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 11:02PM EDT until July 24 at 11:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Erie County in northwestern Pennsylvania... * Until 1145 PM EDT. * At 1102 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of North East to near North Kingsville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Erie, Corry, Edinboro, North East, Union City, Girard, Waterford, Albion, Wattsburg, Northwest Harborcreek, Harborcreek, Lawrence Park, Wesleyville, Lake City, Cranesville, Platea, Mill Village, McKean, Elgin and Northwest Harborcr. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
